title: Robert Reich Insights on Artificial Intelligence and Its Impact on Employment
description: The evolving landscape of employment due to artificial intelligence (AI) is a topic of discussion that has caught the attention of former Secretary of Labor, Robert Reich. He asserts that middle-class workers could find themselves engaging in job bidding as AI substantially reshapes the job market. In a candid interview with CNBC, Reich also elaborates ... Read more

title: Binance CEO predicts decentralized finance will eclipse centralized financial systems
description: Changpeng Zhao, the CEO of Binance, one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, forecasted that decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms would soon outperform centralized financial systems (CeFi). Zhao’s prediction comes at a time when DeFi platforms are gaining unprecedented traction, offering services like lending, borrowing, and asset trading without the need for traditional financial intermediaries. Why ... Read more
